text: The profile view in vscode (with the recommended extra plug in) is quite nice, but it requires some scroll bar or zoom functionality. I got a profile picture which was too large to fit on screen, and couldn't figure out a way to scroll down the call stack to see what was interesting to me. Maybe a way to filter out all the top stack frames related to repl and vscodeserver would also be useful.

text: Btw where I can find more “instructions” related to this feature? e.g. what’s this extra plugin? All I could find was <https://www.julia-vscode.org/docs/stable/release-notes/v0_17/#Profile-viewing-support-1>
